titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Edgar George Frank (1892-1979) attended college at Queen's University in Kingston, Ontario, and Columbia University, New York, and attended seminary at Queen's Theological College and Union Theological Seminary. He was a pastor in Capreol, Ontario (1918-1922), in White Haven, Pennsylvania (1922-1926), and in Owego, New York (1926 until his retirement in 1964).

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of the sermons of Rev. Edgar Frank. The sermons are typed, and many include the dates on which they were preached. The collection also includes copies of the Owego Times from 1964 with stories about his retirement.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
